pages.title: Kamen Rider Zangetsu Shin
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim (2013, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/genesis_driver#genesis_driver_zangetsu_shin)Genesis Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Genesis Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Resistance$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength II

pages.title: Kamen Rider Zangetsu Shin
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Battle: Ganbarizing (2013, arcade game)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/genesis_driver#genesis_driver_zangetsu_shin)Genesis Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Armored Rider$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Night Vision$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength
